A backup is recommended before performin: 推荐在批处理前做下备份
Open batch processing: 打开批量处理 (Open batch processing)
Controls whether to show the toolbar but: 控制是否显示工具栏按钮。
Defines a shortcut for opening batch pro: 为打开批量处理设置一个快捷键。
Deleting a page/block will also delete i: 删除一个页面/块同时会删除它的所有子块，你确定要继续吗？
Each line is a property to delete. E.g:\:
每行是一个待删除的属性。例如：
prop-a
prop-b
Each line is a property to rename. E.g:\:
每行是一个待重命名的属性。例如：
prop-a -> prop-b
Each line is a property to write. E.g:\n:
每行是一个待赋值的属性。例如：
prop-a:: value
prop-b:: value
Are you sure you want to delete these pr: 你确定要从选种的块/页中删除这些属性吗？
Are you sure you want to rename these pr: 你确定要在选种的块/页中重命名这些属性吗？
Are you sure you want to write these pro: 你确定要在选种的块/页中写入这些属性吗？
Are you sure you want to make these repl: 你确定要在选种的块/页中做这些替换吗？
Write down your query here. E.g:\n(and [:
在这里写下你的查询。例如：
(and [[A]] [[B]])
Write down your advanced query here. E.g:
在这里写下你的高级查询。例如：
[:find (pull ?b [*])
 :where
 [?b :block/marker _]]
NOTE: Can only work against blocks, not: 注意：只能用于普通块，页面不适用。
